message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this proposal works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
